name: app-as-web-component
//: We use --deploy-url here although Angular complains it is deprecated since this seems to be
the only way to get Angular to load lazy scripts from a route that differs from base HREF as
given by index.html (which belongs to the host page and we don't control).

scripts.build: cd ../.. && npm run build -- app-as-web-component --output-hashing none --deploy-url edu-sharing/
scripts.build-watch: cd ../.. && ng build app-as-web-component --output-hashing none --deploy-url edu-sharing/ --configuration development --watch
scripts.example: npm run build && npm run preview-example
scripts.example-watch: npm run build-watch & npm run preview-example
